ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: ABA Services
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: ABA Services are created to access various ABA hub features. The services are either implemented at the INCF central server, or represent wrappers of ABA API calls implemented at the ABA site.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get Correlation Map
wps:Process.ows:Description: This method will return the URL and load the correlation map interface in the browser, for a point of interest (POI) in a specified Spatial Reference System (SRS)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get structure name by POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns Fine/Anatomic structures segmented for the POI in a specified SRS

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get 2D Image at POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns 2 Dimensional image given a POI in a specified SRS

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get genes by POI
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns genes detected at a POI in a specified SRS

wps:Process.ows:Title: Get genes by Structure Name
wps:Process.ows:Description: Returns genes detected for structure name at a specified vocabulary

wps:Process.ows:Title: Atlas Space Transformation from WHS and one or more coordinate spaces local to the hub
wps:Process.ows:Description: Finds, transforms and executes the best coordinate transformation between WHS, ABAvoxel, ABAreference, and AGEA spaces
